attributes.action: Ensure all injured members of the armed forces have access to AFIP irrespective of date of injury.
attributes.additional_details: Ensure that all members of the armed forces no matter the date of injury should be considered for the AFIP. To ensure security and financial stability. At present only those injured after 2005 qualify this is unfair and the MOD responses are not good enough and show a disregard for those veterans injured before 05.
